DOC.brief_summary: The use of NPWT as a post-operative dressing significantly reduces the incidence of seroma formation after harvesting LD flap.
DOC.brief_title: Role of Negative Pressure Wound Therapy in Latissimus Dorsi Flap Donor Site Seroma Prevention
DOC.detailed_description: NPWT was left in place on donor site with constant pressure between -125 and -80 mmHg to reduce seroma formation
DOC.criteria: Age between 2060 years Underwent breast reconstruction with LD Flap Locally advanced cancer
